Class HMMPOSTagger

java.lang.Object
smile.nlp.pos.HMMPOSTagger
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, POSTagger
public class HMMPOSTagger extends Object implements POSTagger, Serializable
Part-of-speech tagging with hidden Markov model.
